Author: local333
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello there! How does your blockchain work? Is your blockchain secure?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Welcome! First of all we want you to note that only possible online payment methods on our platform is CRS Token. In a similar vein, we wish to emphasize that based on a blockchain technology, we have developed a decentralized and private double-authorization protocol that combines all the benefits of cash and online transactions while eliminating almost all risks for each party involved.  Talking about the procedure of double-authorization protocol, it is rather simple and logic. This double-authorization protocol includes the following two steps: searching/booking and a transaction confirmation.  At first, a model have to negotiate the booking with a client. After that client's funds will be immediately transferred from his account into our CRS token smart contract. This funds will be frozen on our CRS smart contract until the booking is confirmed. After the reaching verbal confirmation between the client and the service provider, the client will need to give a final confirmation to the tokens' transaction through our mobile app. Only after that the tokens will be instantly sent to performer's account.  Besides, in case CRS token system doesn't receive confirmation, the funds are automatically returned to the customer's account and the agreement is terminated.

Author: Tygrabandis2
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Why you didn't do your own blockchain?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! First of all, CRS is a token, not a coin as tokens are a representation of a particular asset or utility, that usually resides on top of another blockchain. Tokens can represent basically any assets that are fungible and tradeable, from commodities to loyalty points to even other cryptocurrencies!  Creating tokens is a much easier process as you do not have to modify the codes from a particular protocol or create a blockchain from scratch. All you have to do is follow a standard template on the blockchain according to that we are using Ethereum blockchain that allows you to create your own tokens. This functionality of creating your own tokens is made possible through the use of smart contracts which are one of the main advantages of our payment system;programmable computer codes that are self-executing and do not need any third-parties to operate.

Author: Feth322
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings!!! How can a model prove that the customer misbehaved afterwards???

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hi there! Upon the meeting, service performer has the right to a final decision. If everything is confirmed, a service provider will need to ask a client to confirm the transaction through his mobile app by simply pressing the button. CRS blockchain system will automatically recognize this confirmation as a 2nd authorization step immediately unblocks the money and transfer it to the associated account.  Service performer will be able to see an instant credit on her or his account. This is the most crucial step of the platform. By eliminating usual cash transaction, CRYSTALS eliminates all related risks.

Author: Morlurn46
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Is CRYSTALS legal? Where I can find your documents?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: In CRYSTALS we will dedicate a lot of attention to the legal procedures and honesty of the service provided through our platform. CRYSTALS project is a platform that does not provide modeling services directly and our law consultants identified that in most cases, we will not face many barriers in major markets.  The other issue arises from service providers and modeling agencies. In CRYSTALS, we are firmly against any illegal activities, human trafficking or child labor. That is why we will establish a manual verification system. Each services provider will need to pass their age verification and online interview for us to eliminate potential risks. Operation costs article is included in our fund distribution strategy exactly for maintaining support and verification systems within the CRYSTALS platform.  From the customer's point of view, most modeling platforms today offer an overwhelmingly aggressive, complicated, and vulgar user experience. So the first thing that our customer will notice is that CRYSTALS is not like any other industry’s representative. With its modern, light, and welcoming design, it will move customers to explore and make use of the platform.  To look through our terms & agreements paper you can check the following links: https://crystals.io/CrystalsAML.pdf https://crystals.io/CrystalsTSA.pdf

Author: local333
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Why you didn't create your own blockchain?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: First of all, CRS is a token, not a coin as tokens are a representation of a particular asset or utility, that usually resides on top of another blockchain. Tokens can represent basically any assets that are fungible and tradeable, from commodities to loyalty points to even other cryptocurrencies!  Creating tokens is a much easier process as you do not have to modify the codes from a particular protocol or create a blockchain from scratch. All you have to do is follow a standard template on the blockchain according to that we are using Ethereum blockchain that allows you to create your own tokens. This functionality of creating your own tokens is made possible through the use of smart contracts which are one of the main advantages of our payment system;programmable computer codes that are self-executing and do not need any third-parties to operate.

Author: Morlurn46
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello! Why did you choose Ethereum blockchain?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hi, there! Launched in 2015, Ethereum is a decentralized software platform that enables Smart Contracts and Distributed Applications (DApps) to be built and run without any downtime, fraud, control or interference from a third party.  Ethereum is not just a platform but also a programming language (Turing complete) running on a blockchain, helping developers to build and publish distributed applications. The potential applications of Ethereum are wide ranging. That’s why we decided Ethereum is the best platform for the CRS.

Author: Morlurn46
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: What is the difference between ICO and IPO?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: IPO is a traditional way of getting funds for your project. When investor participates in an IPO, he buys some shares of the company, automatically claiming some of the company's profit in the future.  ICO is a digital counterpart to an IPO. It's a way to crowdfund your project through the issue of tokens. It doesn't give an investor any kind of ownership stake, stable dividends or the capability to influence company's business decisions.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hi there! First of all we want you to note that only possible online payment methods on our platform is CRS Token. In a similar vein, we wish to emphasize that based on a blockchain technology, we have developed a decentralized and private double-authorization protocol that combines all the benefits of cash and online transactions while eliminating almost all risks for each party involved.  Talking about the procedure of double-authorization protocol, it is rather simple and logic. This double-authorization protocol includes the following two steps: searching/booking and a transaction confirmation.  At first, a model have to negotiate the booking with a client. After that client's funds will be immediately transferred from his account into our CRS token smart contract. This funds will be frozen on our CRS smart contract until the booking is confirmed. After the reaching verbal confirmation between the client and the service provider, the client will need to give a final confirmation to the tokens' transaction through our mobile app. Only after that the tokens will be instantly sent to performer's account.  Besides, in case CRS token system doesn't receive confirmation, the funds are automatically returned to the customer's account and the agreement is terminated.

Author: Tygrabandis2
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings, Crystals!! How do you ensure safeness of the payment on your platform??

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello! Based on a blockchain technology, we have developed a decentralized and private double-authorization protocol that combines all the benefits of cash and online transactions while eliminating almost all risks for each party involved.  When a customer wants to arrange for a meeting with a model, he/she creates a pending order for a service provider. As a booking is made, funds will be immediately transferred from client's account into our CRS token smart contract. In order to complete the 1st step of authorization the service performer will need to confirm the booking. At this stage, the client's funds are frozen on our CRS smart contract until further confirmation.  Providing that the 1st step of double-authorization has been done, the customer and service provider will have to meet in person to agree upon the details of the order and reach a verbal confirmation. If everything is discussed and agreed, the client will need to give a final confirmation to the tokens transaction. He/she will be able to do that through our mobile app afterwards the tokens will be instantly sent to performer's account. The 2nd authorization step is completed. In case CRS token system doesn't receive confirmation, the funds are automatically returned to the customer's account and the agreement is terminated.

Author: Feth322
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Why you didn't make your own blockchain?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: First of all, CRS is a token, not a coin as tokens are a representation of a particular asset or utility, that usually resides on top of another blockchain. Tokens can represent basically any assets that are fungible and tradeable, from commodities to loyalty points to even other cryptocurrencies!  Creating tokens is a much easier process as you do not have to modify the codes from a particular protocol or create a blockchain from scratch. All you have to do is follow a standard template on the blockchain according to that we are using Ethereum blockchain that allows you to create your own tokens. This functionality of creating your own tokens is made possible through the use of smart contracts which are one of the main advantages of our payment system;programmable computer codes that are self-executing and do not need any third-parties to operate.

Author: cabbage55
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! What can be done with your platform by performers? Thanks in advance

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello there! In the current business environment, individual service performers face several limitations. First of all, most of the similar platforms work as a chargeable bulletin board. In other words, they charge models fixed fees on a weekly or monthly basis for which, in return, they enlist individuals on the website. However, this system is proven to be inefficient and does not guarantee any financial gain for service performers. In CRYSTALS, we consider this approach as outdated and more often than not, fraudulent. That is why we will charge all service providers a commission only upon a successfully executed service order.  Registration and listing will be done under our support and free of charge. Models will be granted full access to our distribution and marketing channels. Besides, they will be able to see complete statistical information about their profile, including orders and views. In exchange, we will deduct a commission of 4-10%, depending on the market where we operate. This commission will only be inferred from a completed order made through our platform.  On the other hand, blockchain technology behind the payment system in CRYSTALS can avoid unfair practices related to money transfers in modeling industry. That is why CRS token is the only payment method within the CRYSTALS ecosystem, which guarantees privacy, decentralization, and protection to all users of the network. On the other hand, blockchain allows any user of the system to see all transactions and account balances. At CRYSTALS, we do not want any of the performers to be a subject of provocation. That is why we will develop a cryptocurrency’s smart contract that will hide the performer’s account balance from the client and other users.

Author: Cezel619
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: How do you ensure that the payment will be secured?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: The CRYSTALS token (CRS) will offer a highly secured payment system with private information protection. There is 100% guarantee that considered responsibilities would be fulfilled due to the integrated escrow smart-contract feature. Our smart contract serves for ensuring an equal anonymity right for both the client and service provider. This double-authorization protocol include the following two steps: The first this is searching and booking. Then your funds are blocked until further confirmation. If you refuse then your funds will be defrosted and you will be able to get it back. So, you will not lose your money if you refuse from services on this stage.  The second step provides transaction confirmation through smartphone. Then funds are successfully transferred to the performer’s account.

Author: Morlurn46
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: GM admin! tell me plz, can you describe a procedure of transaction execution on your platform?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: First of all we want you to note that only possible online payment methods on our platform is CRS Token.  Talking about the procedure, it is rather simple and logic. At first, you have to negotiate the booking with a service provider. After that your funds will be immediately transferred from client's account into our CRS token smart contract. This funds will be frozen on our CRS smart contract until the booking is confirmed. After the reaching verbal confirmation between the client and the service provider, the client will need to give a final confirmation to the tokens' transaction through our mobile app. Only after that the tokens will be instantly sent to performer's account.  Besides, in case CRS token system doesn't receive confirmation, the funds are automatically returned to the customer's account and the agreement is terminated.

Author: germein_lance
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: modeling is interesting with blockchain?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! We deem our project to be particularly interesting because of its innovative approach to the model industry.  For the customer, CRYSTALS is a modern, safe, and user-friendly website platform offering one of the biggest and up-to-date models catalogs. CRYSTALS runs a unique double-authorization payment system based on the CRYSTALS Token (CRS) that allows customers to pay securely, privately, and quickly for all services listed in the CRYSTALS ecosystem.  For the service provider, CRYSTALS is a best-in-class distribution channel and data analysis facility that will act as an ideal partner for both modeling agencies and individuals, providing them with free-of-charge access to a global customer network and modern platform.  We can provide this specifically due to the benefits of the blockchain.  Our ecosystem is based on CRS Token, which is used in a decentralized and private double-authorization protocol that combines all the benefits of cash and online transactions while eliminating almost all risks for each party involved.  Check our whitepaper for more details (“How CRYSTALS works?” section): https://www.crystals.io/whitepaper.pdf

If you refuse then your funds will be defrosted and you will be able to get it back. So, you will not lose your money if you refuse from services on this stage. The second step provides transaction confirmation through smartphone. Then funds are successfully transferred to the performer’s account.

Author: CAKWAWAN
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: What mission is created by a CRYSTALS? What are the main advantages of CRYSTALS? How do the bitcoiner's view with CRYSTALS?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: The idea of CRYSTALS is to become an intermediary between service providers and their clients.  Our team wants to bring all the advantages of Blockchain technology into the modeling industry with the goal of creating a fundamentally new ecosystem that will drive further growth.  Our platform has several significant advantages that clearly distinguish us from other agencies: - User-friendly interface; - International presence; - No listing price; - Complete performers and customers support; - Secured payment method; - High level of privacy; - Information relevancy.  Additional competitive advantages: - Decentralized double-authorization payment method; - Extended statistical reports for individual performers and agencies; - Transparent team and financial model. CRS is our own token which will be only possible payment method on our platform.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! So, unfortunately, the legal status of the cryptocurrency in Ukraine isn't defined.  Moreover, the National Bank can't recognize it as a payment method. That's why we consider Great Britain more reliable zone for registering our platform as the UK is one of the leaders in the development of blockchain projects and cryptocurrency at all.  Also in Britain functions one of the most favorable and convenient jurisdictions for conducting cryptocurrency business.

Author: Morlurn46
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Why do you think that your token has a huge potential?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Modeling industry is stagnating and in a big need of advanced solutions. CRYSTALS took this niche to aggregate as many modeling services as possible, proposing features to solve the present industry problems.  The CRYSTALS token (CRS) will offer a highly secured payment system with private information protection. There is 100% guarantee that considered responsibilities would be fulfilled due to the integrated escrow smart-contract feature. No more fraud, counterfeit money, and theft – everything is transparent and protected.  The usage of a self-developed cryptocurrency CRS will make all transactions completely decentralized, providing the highest level of protection to both client and service performer.

This is because of the fact that KYC influences the protection and security of our users. It helps in further personal identification of a person and as a result it minimizes possibility of registering fake accounts. With KYC there are no more fraud, counterfeit money, and theft – everything is transparent and protected.

Author: Feth322
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: You claim that you haven't any competitors. But you will operate on the same market and divide same clients. Isn't it competition?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: We appreciate your concernment about this. You're absolutely right that we will operate on the same market and divide same clients. But there are some difference in the scheme of our work and in the way we deliver our services.  The ordinary model agency hasn't such possibilities as we do. CRYSLALS is based on blockchain technology which allows each user to be able to be an entrepreneur on his own in secure and private way.  Moreover, on CRYSTALS there will be no commission for models and each client will be able to see all his transactions and account balances.  Due to these reasons, we can claim that model agencies can't be our direct competitors

Author: Tygrabandis2
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hi admin!  Why are you registered in Great Britain but not in Ukraine? What’s problem with Ukrainian jurisdiction?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! So, unfortunately, the legal status of the cryptocurrency in Ukraine isn't defined.  Moreover, the National Bank can't recognize it as a payment method. That's why we consider Great Britain more reliable zone for registering our platform as the UK is one of the leaders in the development of blockchain projects and cryptocurrency at all.  Also in Britain functions one of the most favorable and convenient jurisdictions for conducting cryptocurrency business.

Author: Cezel619
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hi! Can you describe a procedure of transaction execution on your platform?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Thank you for such a useful advise, we will certainly take it into consideration!  Quote from: Cezel619 on July 26, 2018, 06:00:33 AM Hi! Can you describe a procedure of transaction execution on your platform? Hello! First of all we want you to note that only possible online payment methods on our platform is CRS Token.  Talking about the procedure, it is rather simple and logic. At first, you have to negotiate the booking with a service provider. After that your funds will be immediately transferred from client's account into our CRS token smart contract. This funds will be frozen on our CRS smart contract until the booking is confirmed. After the reaching verbal confirmation between the client and the service provider, the client will need to give a final confirmation to the tokens' transaction through our mobile app. Only after that the tokens will be instantly sent to performer's account.  Besides, in case CRS token system doesn't receive confirmation, the funds are automatically returned to the customer's account and the agreement is terminated.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! Yes, we have. In order to make sure that funds raised during our ICO campaign are coming from a legal source, we'll need to have KYC. However, only those who contribute 10k USD and more will have to go through the procedure.  We should mention that our KYC will be rather simple and user-friendly. The only things you'll need to provide will be an Ethereum wallet, official ID, and a proof of residency (this can be done through official government letter, utility bill, bank letter or similar).   But still you should note that only people who have been successfully verified will be able to withdraw their tokens.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: How does crystals work for models?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: CRYSTALS project is an “intermediary” between the service providers and customers. All models and model agencies will be on one platform. In this way, we want to ensure the best service. Models will be granted full access to our distribution and marketing channels. Besides, they will be able to see complete statistical information about their profile, including orders and views. In exchange, we will deduct a commission of 4-10%, depending on the market where we operate. This commission will only be inferred from a completed order made through our platform.

Author: Morlurn46
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! What problems does your project solve?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello! Thank you for the question! The CRYSTALS project solves the problem of geographical fragmentation by aggregating all modeling agencies and private entrepreneurs on a single platform.  Firstly, it will allow talented models to successfully break into major agencies without having solid ties or media names. Secondly, small agencies will find it easier to merge with each other and compete everywhere with the industry’s largest companies. Thirdly, it does not matter where the client will be and where the meeting will take place - the ecosystem will be available worldwide. In such a way CRYSTALS will create healthy conditions for the industry development in general.

Body: Greetings! First of all we want you to note that only possible online payment methods on our platform is CRS Token.  Talking about the procedure, it is rather simple and logic. At first, you have to negotiate the booking with a client. After that client's funds will be immediately transferred from his account into our CRS token smart contract. This funds will be frozen on our CRS smart contract until the booking is confirmed. After the reaching verbal confirmation between the client and the service provider, the client will need to give a final confirmation to the tokens' transaction through our mobile app. Only after that the tokens will be instantly sent to performer's account.  Besides, in case CRS token system doesn't receive confirmation, the funds are automatically returned to the customer's account and the agreement is terminated.

Here are some reasons why we need the private sale: • possibility of quick return if tokens bought at discount are sold at ICO price when token trading begins; • assured supply of tokens for if ICO hits hardcap during private sale or pre-sale which is highly possible in very popular ICO; •  possibility of purchasing more tokens compared to crowdsale or pre-sale since private sale usually aimed at institutional level investors.

Hardcap also allows us to release API and attract more partners. We will be able to launch the platform in several markets simultaneously.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello there! Talking about this procedure, it is rather simple and logical. At first, you have to negotiate the booking with a client. After that client's funds will be immediately transferred from his account into our CRS token smart contract. This funds will be frozen on our CRS smart contract until the booking is confirmed. After the reaching verbal confirmation between the client and the service provider, the client will need to give a final confirmation to the tokens' transaction through our mobile app. Only after that the tokens will be instantly sent to performer's account.

Author: local333
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: How does your blockchain work? Is your blockchain secure?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: The project ecosystem is based on our CRS Token, which is the only accepted payment method. Based on a blockchain technology, we have developed a decentralized and private double-authorization protocol that combines all the benefits of cash and online transactions while eliminating almost all risks for each party involved.  When a customer wants to arrange for a meeting with a model, he/she creates a pending order for a service provider. As a booking is made, funds will be immediately transferred from client's account into our CRS token smart contract. In order to complete the 1st step of authorization the service performer will need to confirm the booking. At this stage, the client's funds are frozen on our CRS smart contract until further confirmation.  Providing that the 1st step of double-authorization has been done, the customer and service provider will have to meet in person to agree upon the details of the order and reach a verbal confirmation. If everything is discussed and agreed, the client will need to give a final confirmation to the tokens transaction. He/she will be able to do that through our mobile app afterwards the tokens will be instantly sent to performer's account. The 2nd authorization step is completed. In case CRS token system doesn't receive confirmation, the funds are automatically returned to the customer's account and the agreement is terminated.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello there! There is going to be a system of bonuses for token purchase during our CRS token sale.  The following list presents information about the bonuses. The earlier investment is made, the more significant is the bonus percentage.  Private sale - 40% with no time limit applicable Pre ICO - 25% for 15 days Crowdsale, Wave 1 - 10% for 15 days Crowdsale, Wave 2 - 0% for 15 days  For even more details you can check our whitepaper here: https://www.crystals.io/whitepaper.pdf  Quote from: Cezel619 on July 21, 2018, 03:52:46 AM Will I be able to cancel my agreement with model without losing tokens?  Greetings! Thanks for interesting question! Double-authorization protocol include the following two steps: The first this is searching and booking. Then your funds are blocked until further confirmation. If you refuse then your funds will be defrosted and you will be able to get it back. So, you will not lose your money if you refuse from services on this stage. The second step provides transaction confirmation through smartphone. Then funds are successfully transferred to the performer’s account.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings!  The project ecosystem is based on our CRS Token, which is the only accepted payment method. Based on a blockchain technology, we have developed a decentralized and private double-authorization protocol that combines all the benefits of cash and online transactions while eliminating almost all risks for each party involved.   The CRYSTALS token (CRS) will offer a highly secured payment system with private information protection. There is 100% guarantee that considered responsibilities would be fulfilled due to the integrated escrow smart-contract feature. No more fraud, counterfeit money, and theft – everything is transparent and protected.  Check our whitepaper for more details (“How CRYSTALS works?” section): https://www.crystals.io/whitepaper.pdf

Author: Tygrabandis2
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello admin! How I can became your advisor?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello! In the current business environment, individual service performers face several limitations. First of all, most of the similar platforms work as a chargeable bulletin board. In other words, they charge models fixed fees on a weekly or monthly basis for which, in return, they enlist individuals on the website. However, this system is proven to be inefficient and does not guarantee any financial gain for service performers. In CRYSTALS, we consider this approach as outdated unprotected more often than not, fraudulent. That is why we will charge all service providers a commission only upon a successfully executed service order.  Registration and listing will be done under our support and free of charge. Models will be granted full access to our distribution and marketing channels. Besides, they will be able to see complete statistical information about their profile, including orders and views. In exchange, we will deduct a commission of 4-10%, depending on the market where we operate. This commission will only be inferred from a completed order made through our platform.  On the other hand, blockchain technology behind the payment system in CRYSTALS can avoid unfair practices related to money transfers in modeling industry. That is why CRS token is the only payment method within the CRYSTALS ecosystem, which guarantees privacy, decentralization, and protection to all users of the network. On the other hand, blockchain allows any user of the system to see all transactions and account balances. At CRYSTALS, we do not want any of the performers to be a subject of provocation. That is why we will develop a cryptocurrency smart contract that will hide the performer’s account balance from the client and other users.

Body: We help you with pleasure! The reason we chose Ethereum blockchain is that, launched in 2015, Ethereum is a decentralized software platform that enables Smart Contracts and Distributed Applications (DApps) to be built and run without any downtime, fraud, control or interference from a third party. Ethereum is not just a platform but also a programming language (Turing complete) running on a blockchain, helping developers to build and publish distributed applications. The potential applications of Ethereum are wide ranging. That’s why we decided Ethereum is the best platform for the CRS.

Author: local333
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: How does crystals ecosystem work?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: The CRYSTALS ecosystem provides a full user-friendly service for customers and performers through two main products: CRYSTALS website and mobile app companion. It happened before when modeling-related applications were not accepted by the App Store and Google Play Market. We are already working on several solutions regarding that. One of which will include a self-signed certificate that any user can easily install on their mobile device.  CRYSTALS will provide all new users with a prepaid encrypted cryptocurrency wallet. Similar to a prepaid card, customers will need to transfer the CRS token into our platform from his primary account to the prepaid account on our website. When client decided on his choice, he creates a pending order for the service provider. The order will have to include all necessary details, such as a type of a date, time, service needed etc. Immediately after booking is done, funds will be transferred from clients’ account into our CRS token smart contract. It is the 1st step of our double-authorization function.  At this point, the customer knows that his money is in safe, blocked by smart-contract, and can be easily refunded. Since there is a commission on using Ethereum-based token transaction of 0.30-0.40 cents, the number of fake bookings or cancellations from the customer side will be limited. CRYSTALS platform is entirely free for all users. However, these transaction fees bring seriousness to all bookings. The booking then should be approved by the performer. The approval notification will reach both parties to the agreement. At this stage, money is held between both parties of the agreement. The decentralized blockchain system allows this be controlled neither by CRYSTALS team nor by any of the agreement party.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Could you please explain me to what extent do you need blockchain for this project? What's the special use case of blockchain  in Crystals and why is it not possible to do it in traditional ways?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: The project ecosystem is based on our CRS Token, which is the only accepted payment method. Based on a blockchain technology, we have developed a decentralized and private double-authorization protocol that combines all the benefits of cash and online transactions while eliminating almost all risks for each party involved.  When a customer wants to arrange for a meeting with a model, he/she creates a pending order for a service provider. As a booking is made, funds will be immediately transferred from client's account into our CRS token smart contract. In order to complete the 1st step of authorization the service performer will need to confirm the booking. At this stage, the client's funds are frozen on our CRS smart contract until further confirmation. W  Providing that the 1st step of double-authorization has been done, the customer and service provider will have to meet in person to agree upon the details of the order and reach a verbal confirmation. If everything is discussed and agreed, the client will need to give a final confirmation to the tokens transaction. He/she will be able to do that through our mobile app afterwards the tokens will be instantly sent to performer's account. The 2nd authorization step is completed. In case CRS token system doesn't receive confirmation, the funds are automatically returned to the customer's account and the agreement is terminated.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! The idea of CRYSTALS is to become an intermediary between service providers and their clients. This business model will not require high investments for investors to grow with minimal risk. This way, CRYSTALS will not provide any modeling services directly but will organize and support a secured, convenient, blockchain-based platform for this business. At CRYSTALS, we aim to create a single global ecosystem that will revitalize the modeling business and gather all modeling agencies and models from around the world in one place. Our team wants to bring all the advantages of Blockchain technology into the modeling industry with the goal of creating a fundamentally new ecosystem that will drive further growth. Our platform has several significant advantages that clearly distinguish us from other agencies: - User-friendly interface; - International presence; - No listing price; - Complete performers and customers support; - Secured payment method; - High level of privacy; - Information relevancy. Additional competitive advantages: - Decentralized double-authorization payment method; - Extended statistical reports for individual performers and agencies; - Transparent team and financial model.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: What is the difference between ICO and IPO?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: IPO is a traditional way of getting funds for your project. When investor participates in an IPO, he buys some shares of the company, automatically claiming some of the company's profit in the future.  ICO is a digital counterpart to an IPO. It's a way to crowdfund your project through the issue of tokens. It doesn't give an investor any kind of ownership stake, stable dividends or the capability to influence company's business decisions.

Author: Morlurn46
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Is your blockchain decentralized?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: The project ecosystem is based on our CRS Token, which is the only accepted payment method. Based on a blockchain technology, we have developed a decentralized and private double-authorization protocol that combines all the benefits of cash and online transactions while eliminating almost all risks for each party involved.  When a customer wants to arrange for a meeting with a model, he/she creates a pending order for a service provider. As a booking is made, funds will be immediately transferred from client's account into our CRS token smart contract. In order to complete the 1st step of authorization the service performer will need to confirm the booking. At this stage, the client's funds are frozen on our CRS smart contract until further confirmation.  Providing that the 1st step of double-authorization has been done, the customer and service provider will have to meet in person to agree upon the details of the order and reach a verbal confirmation. If everything is discussed and agreed, the client will need to give a final confirmation to the tokens transaction. He/she will be able to do that through our mobile app afterwards the tokens will be instantly sent to performer's account. The 2nd authorization step is completed. In case CRS token system doesn't receive confirmation, the funds are automatically returned to the customer's account and the agreement is terminated.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: The idea of CRYSTALS is to become an intermediary between service providers and their clients.  Our team wants to bring all the advantages of Blockchain technology into the modeling industry with the goal of creating a fundamentally new ecosystem that will drive further growth.  Our platform has several significant advantages that clearly distinguish us from other agencies: - User-friendly interface; - International presence; - No listing price; - Complete performers and customers support; - Secured payment method; - High level of privacy; - Information relevancy.  Additional competitive advantages: - Decentralized double-authorization payment method; - Extended statistical reports for individual performers and agencies; - Transparent team and financial model. CRS is our own token which will be only possible payment method on our platform.

Author: Tygrabandis2
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello there.... tell me please, are you operating legally?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hi! In CRYSTALS we will dedicate a lot of attention to the legal procedures and honesty of the service provided through our platform. CRYSTALS project is a platform that does not provide modeling services directly and our law consultants identified that in most cases, we will not face many barriers in major markets. The other issue arises from service providers and modeling agencies. In CRYSTALS, we are firmly against any illegal activities, human trafficking or child labor. That is why we will establish a manual verification system. Each services provider will need to pass their age verification and online interview for us to eliminate potential risks. Operation costs article is included in our fund distribution strategy exactly for maintaining support and verification systems within the CRYSTALS platform. From the customer's point of view, most modeling platforms today offer an overwhelmingly aggressive, complicated, and vulgar user experience. So the first thing that our customer will notice is that CRYSTALS is not like any other industry’s representative. With its modern, light, and welcoming design, it will move customers to explore and make use of the platform. What is more important than design is the privacy and security we offer our target audiences. At CRYSTALS, we clearly understand that due to the nature of the services provided, both our partners and our clients are susceptible to all aspects of privacy. For this reason, our project is directly connected to our self-developed token, CRS. Based on the technology of cryptocurrencies double authorization powered by our smart contract.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hi. Will I be able to cancel my agreement with model without losing tokens?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hey there! Thanks for an interesting question! Double-authorization protocol include the following two steps: The first this is searching and booking. Then your funds are blocked until further confirmation. If you refuse then your funds will be defrosted and you will be able to get it back. So, you will not lose your money if you refuse from services on this stage. The second step provides transaction confirmation through smartphone. Then funds are successfully transferred to the performer’s account.

To implement smart-contracts, a decentralized environment is required that completely excludes the human factor. To use the transfer of value in a smart-contract, it requires a cryptocurrency.  The client's funds are in safe, blocked by smart-contract, and can be easily refunded.

Author: Tygrabandis2
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: What problems does your project solve?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! The CRYSTALS project solves the problem of geographical fragmentation by aggregating all modeling agencies and private entrepreneurs on a single platform. Firstly, it will allow talented models to successfully break into major agencies without having solid ties or media names. Secondly, small agencies will find it easier to merge with each other and compete everywhere with the industry’s largest companies. Thirdly, it does not matter where the client will be and where the meeting will take place - the ecosystem will be available worldwide. In such a way CRYSTALS will create healthy conditions for the industry development in general.

Body: Why are you using Ethereum? Why did you choose Ethereum blockchain? What benefits does it have?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hi there! Launched in 2015, Ethereum is a decentralized software platform that enables Smart Contracts and Distributed Applications (DApps) to be built and run without any downtime, fraud, control or interference from a third party. Ethereum is not just a platform but also a programming language (Turing complete) running on a blockchain, helping developers to build and publish distributed applications. The potential applications of Ethereum are wide ranging. That’s why we decided Ethereum is the best platform for the CRS.

Author: Feth322
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: What problems does your project solve?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: The CRYSTALS project solves the problem of geographical fragmentation by aggregating all modeling agencies and private entrepreneurs on a single platform.  Firstly, it will allow talented models to successfully break into major agencies without having solid ties or media names. Secondly, small agencies will find it easier to merge with each other and compete everywhere with the industry’s largest companies. Thirdly, it does not matter where the client will be and where the meeting will take place - the ecosystem will be available worldwide. In such a way CRYSTALS will create healthy conditions for the industry development in general.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Modeling service is a very sensitive due to the social poor understanding of the topic. This gives the top priority level of the privacy and security. In CRYSTALS, we found the best solution to provide both customers and service performers with privacy and security on one hand, and convenience on the other. Our CRYSTALS Token, CRS, with a unique double-authorization function will become an easy-to-use online payment method within the CRYSTALS ecosystem. CRYSTALS Token is the only possible online payment methods that devoid of all contemporary risks associated with online transactions. Thus, it combines all benefits from cash transactions, online payment methods and open smart contract technology, creating a special financial user friendly environment that is perfectly designed for modeling industry.

It is crucial for us to capture all potential markets as quickly as possible. In today’s globalized business environment, it is very easy to copy any business model and to develop a similar product. Knowing that we will allocate the majority of the raised funds for marketing purposes and support chain development in order to become a worldwide service provider in modeling industry.  In case you'd like to compare the numbers and see our current priorities, you can check out our allocation scheme for soft cap and hard cap in the whitepaper, 'Funds Distribution' section, on https://crystals.io

Author: Tygrabandis2
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings Crystals! I do not know anything about crypto currency What is token?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello there!  A token is a special frame that is passed from node to node around a ring network. When it gets to a node that needs to transmit data, the node changes the token into a data frame and transmits it to the recipient. A token is essential to the inner workings of a token ring network.  The token can only be handled by a single node at a time. The bearer of the token is the only one allowed to send data around the network to a recipient node within the network. The bearer of the token writes the address of the recipient and the data to be sent, and then sends it to the next node in the series. ( In our case, tokens will be used in order to pay for some service provided within CRYSTALS ecosystem).  The CRS token is the only payment method that will be accepted in the CRYSTALS ecosystem. The CRS is based on ERC20 smart contract protocol, which, however, is modified according to our project needs. As it was explained before, he unique function of CRYSTAL Token is a double authorization of every transaction. This is a key feature that makes it possible for us to bring the highest level of security, privacy, and convenience to the customers and service providers. More about it you can read on our whitepaper: https://du3m9xzpbu52i.cloudfront.net/whitepaper.pdf

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Concerning our project CRYSTALS is a complete ecosystem that provides a full-service cycle for private modeling clients, models, and agencies. This platform is made to be the first ever software for the modeling industry with the use of blockchain and shared economy principles.  At CRYSTALS, we believe that in the 21st century, everyone should be able to be an entrepreneur on his own. As it can be seen, platforms such as Uber and Airbnb created a whole new concept of realizing unused individual assets in order to generate extra income. On the other hand, we have seen how online distribution channels such as Booking.com and Skyscanner changed the world of marketing for the tourism industry. Applying the same principles of shared economy and online distribution, CRYSTALS will become a tool for both.  The idea of CRYSTALS is to become an intermediary between service providers and their clients. This business model will not require high investments for investors to grow with minimal risk. This way, CRYSTALS will not provide any modeling services directly but will organize and support a secured, convenient, blockchain-based platform for this business.  Moreover, this will decrease the legal responsibility of the platform without decreasing the level of control of operations. Modeling industry is a very sensitive field and in CRYSTALS, we will dedicate a lot of attention to the legal procedures and honesty of the service provided through our platform.

Author: local333
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Why KYC is so important for your project?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: KYC is the only possible solution for CRYSTALS to validate that funds raised during ICO are coming from a legal source. That is why we will be initiating a simple, user-friendly KYC process for all investors, wishing to join our Whitelist. This process will require users to provide an Ethereum wallet, official ID, and a proof of residency (this can be done through official government letter, utility bill, bank letter or similar). Please note that only people who have been successfully verified will have access to the CRS token sale. It is also extremely important that KYC process does not protect the project only, but it protects you, as an investor. By identifying yourself, you are protecting your investment and proving the legal status of it.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! Our  forecasted values are based on assumptions provided below, where we use minimal or lowered down indexes, which allow us to remain on the conservative side but with significant upside potential. Please note that all figures are subject to changes and are based on current industry statistics, which are very scarce and difficult to come by:  We expect the conversion rate of all users to be roughly 75%;  Total orders are calculated assuming that each user will perform at least 2 orders per year;  The average check is lowered down to USD 400. However, based on our industry research, this will be most probably doubled;  Gross margin for similar online platforms, without significant inventories, is between 85-90%. However, due to the high capital expenditure to support chain and legal consultations, we estimate CRYSTALS gross margin to be a minimum of 75%.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello there! Thanks for interesting question! Double-authorization protocol include the following two steps: The first this is searching and booking. Then your funds are blocked until further confirmation. If you refuse then your funds will be defrosted and you will be able to get it back. So, you will not lose your money if you refuse from services on this stage. The second step provides transaction confirmation through smartphone. Then funds are successfully transferred to the performer’s account.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello there! We will allocate so much money for wallet creation, because we're not creating an ordinary crypto wallet. Our task is to create the most convenient way for the regular user to interact with our platform.  We understand that the average customer of the model industry is not familiar with the cryptocurrency, especially the models themselves. That's why we will create a wallet which you can use directly to buy CRS from your account / credit card and start using the platform. And the model can easily get fiat money for everyday use.  So we've allocated this exact amount of money to develop a comprehensive solution from scratch and establish partnerships with various financial institutions.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Modeling service is a very sensitive due to the social poor understanding of the topic. This gives the top priority level of the privacy and security. In CRYSTALS, we found the best solution to provide both customers and service performers with privacy and security on one hand, and convenience on the other. Our CRYSTALS Token, CRS, with a unique double-authorization function will become an easy-to-use online payment method within the CRYSTALS ecosystem. CRYSTALS Token is the only possible online payment methods that devoid of all contemporary risks associated with online transactions. Thus, it combines all benefits from cash transactions, online payment methods and open smart contract technology, creating a special financial user friendly environment that is perfectly designed for modeling industry.

Body: What problems does your project solve?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: The CRYSTALS project solves the problem of geographical fragmentation by aggregating all modeling agencies and private entrepreneurs on a single platform.  Firstly, it will allow talented models to successfully break into major agencies without having solid ties or media names. Secondly, small agencies will find it easier to merge with each other and compete everywhere with the industry’s largest companies. Thirdly, it does not matter where the client will be and where the meeting will take place - the ecosystem will be available worldwide. In such a way CRYSTALS will create healthy conditions for the industry development in general.

Author: Morlurn46
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Can you write me some details about smart contract?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! Smart contract helps you exchange money, property, shares, or anything of value in a transparent, conflict-free way while avoiding the services of a middleman.  The CRYSTALS token (CRS) will offer a highly secured payment system with private information protection. There is 100% guarantee that considered responsibilities would be fulfilled due to the integrated escrow smart-contract feature. Our smart contract serves for ensuring an equal anonymity right for both the client and service provider. This double-authorization protocol include the following two steps: The first this is searching and booking. Then your funds are blocked until further confirmation. If you refuse then your funds will be defrosted and you will be able to get it back. So, you will not lose your money if you refuse from services on this stage.  The second step provides transaction confirmation through smartphone. Then funds are successfully transferred to the performer’s account.  You can check out our smart contract which is available at https://github.com/crystalslove/Crystals-Love

Body: Hello! KYC is the only possible solution for CRYSTALS to validate that funds raised during ICO are coming from a legal source. That is why we will be initiating a simple, user-friendly KYC process for all investors, wishing to join our Whitelist. This process will require users to provide an Ethereum wallet, official ID, and a proof of residency (this can be done through official government letter, utility bill, bank letter or similar). Please note that only people who have been successfully verified will have access to the CRS token sale.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Sure! We're working hard for our project to reach its goals. There’s a number of advantages which we believe are making CRYSTALS the ultimate payment and distribution blockchain solution for the modelling industry and will lead to success.  Our strengths are: • matured $20 billion industry; • a lot of already operating agencies, meaning a lot of potential partners; • high demand for the services; • big amount of service performers. Our opportunities: • no competition for the CRYSTALS platform; • innovations that can generate profit; • industry is seeking for the changes of the game; • ability to take a share from the industry by becoming an “intermediary”.  Finally, combined with a rapid expansion strategy and an active marketing campaign, the CRYSTALS project is anticipated to become a global service provider by the year 2020. It is expected to have more than 550 thousand users, 25 thousand active services performers, 825 thousand orders per year and 4 different platforms generating 26 million USD in revenue by the third year of operations.  At CRYSTALS, we aim to create a single global ecosystem that will revitalize the modeling business and gather all modeling agencies and models from around the world in one place. Our team wants to bring all the advantages of Blockchain technology into the modeling industry with the goal of creating a fundamentally new ecosystem that will drive further growth.

Please, track our news not to miss this info Quote from: Tygrabandis2 on July 07, 2018, 07:46:39 PM Why are you using Ethereum? Hi there! Launched in 2015, Ethereum is a decentralized software platform that enables Smart Contracts and Distributed Applications (DApps) to be built and run without any downtime, fraud, control or interference from a third party.  Ethereum is not just a platform but also a programming language (Turing complete) running on a blockchain, helping developers to build and publish distributed applications. The potential applications of Ethereum are wide ranging. That’s why we decided Ethereum is the best platform for the CRS.

Author: Cezel619
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: I reminded one interesting question!! I read that you have smart-contracts and transaction needs confirmation of both parts. So, can customer fool model by not confirming the meeting which took place?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Actually, upon the meeting, service performer has the right to a final decision. If everything is confirmed, a service provider will need to ask a client to confirm the transaction through his mobile app by simply pressing the button. CRS blockchain system will automatically recognize this confirmation as a 2nd authorization step immediately unblocks the money and transfer it to the associated account. Service performer will be able to see an instant credit on her or his account. This is the most crucial step of the platform. By eliminating usual cash transaction, CRYSTALS eliminates all related risks.

Author: Tygrabandis2
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Will you use any double-authentication procedures on your platform? It's when password is not enough to entry account and you have to proof your identity with other, additional ways, for example, by SMS-code or Google Authenticator mobile app.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello! Our project is now in the development, so we can't claim whether or not there will be any double-authentication procedures, but we can ensure you that CRYSTALS runs a unique double-authorization payment system based on the CRYSTALS token (CRS) that allows customers to pay securely, privately, and quickly for all services listed in the CRYSTALS ecosystem.  Double-authorization protocol includes the following two steps: The first is searching and booking. Then your funds are blocked until further confirmation. If you refuse then your funds will be defrosted and you will be able to get it back. So, you will not lose your money if you refuse from services on this stage. The second step provides transaction confirmation through smartphone. Then funds are successfully transferred to the performer’s account.

Author: Cezel619
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hi there! Why do I have to choose blockchain system to work with model agencies?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! First of all, blockchain allows any user of the system to see all transactions and account balances. At CRYSTALS, we do not want any of the performers to be a subject of provocation. Secondly, blockchain technology behind the payment system in CRYSTALS can avoid unfair practices related to money transfers in modeling industry. That is why we will develop a cryptocurrency smart contract based on the blockchain that will hide the performer’s account balance from the client and other users. So that, our clients can be completely sure about their privacy, security and hight level service.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hi there! The CRS is the base currency for CRYSTALS Ecosystem, so with every new user the demand for CRS grows. All services within ecosystem can be paid exclusively via CRS. Direct covering of new markets and platform development is the first reason for token’s growth. Userbase will grow respectively with each new market. CRYSTALS also doesn’t have direct competitors while technically and legislatively ecosystem can operate worldwide. We are negotiating with major modeling agencies all over the world. Moreover, API will be made for integration with different payment systems. Every such integration will open access for hundreds and thousands points-of-sale over the world. As a result, CRS will be usable for other industries (different events, freelance).

Author: Morlurn46
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello Crystals! Can you tell me something about your platform?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! CRYSTALS is a complete ecosystem that provides a full-service cycle for private modeling clients, models, and agencies. This platform is made to be the first ever software for the modeling industry with the use of blockchain and shared economy principles. At CRYSTALS, we believe that in the 21st century, everyone should be able to be an entrepreneur on his own. As it can be seen, platforms such as Uber and Airbnb created a whole new concept of realizing unused individual assets in order to generate extra income. On the other hand, we have seen how online distribution channels such as Booking.com and Skyscanner changed the world of marketing for the tourism industry. Applying the same principles of shared economy and online distribution, CRYSTALS will become a tool for both. The idea of CRYSTALS is to become an intermediary between service providers and their clients. This business model will not require high investments for investors to grow with minimal risk. This way, CRYSTALS will not provide any modeling services directly but will organize and support a secured, convenient, blockchain-based platform for this business. Moreover, this will decrease the legal responsibility of the platform without decreasing the level of control of operations. Modeling industry is a very sensitive field and in CRYSTALS, we will dedicate a lot of attention to the legal procedures and honesty of the service provided through our platform.

Author: Feth322
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: So what is a blockchain? I can't understand it, clarify this question, please

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello! Thanks for an interesting question. Blockchain is a big deal that takes a lot of explaining. In summary, it is: a distributed database that doesn’t have storage devices connected to a shared server. This database stores an ever-growing list of ordered records, called blocks. Each block contains a timestamp and a link to the previous block. We recommend researching the details yourself.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hi there! Our tokens are a representation of a particular asset or utility that usually resides on top of another blockchain. Tokens can represent basically any assets that are fungible and tradable, from commodities to loyalty points to even other cryptocurrencies! In our case, one CRS token displays the value of one CRS on top of the Ethereum blockchain.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Will registration have any uncommon features?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: The registration and listing will be done under our support and free of charge. After registration of your account you will be able to book the model's service. It has some uncommon features with our double-authorization protocol which include the following two steps: The first this is searching and booking. Then your funds are blocked until further confirmation. If you refuse then your funds will be defrosted and you will be able to get it back. So, you will not lose your money if you refuse from services on this stage. The second step provides transaction confirmation through smartphone. Then funds are successfully transferred to the performer’s account.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello there! There’s a number of advantages which we believe are making CRYSTALS the ultimate payment and distribution blockchain solution for the modelling industry.  Our strengths are: • matured $20 billion industry; • a lot of already operating agencies, meaning a lot of potential partners; • high demand for the services; • big amount of service performers. Our opportunities: • no competition for the CRYSTALS platform; • innovations that can generate profit; • industry is seeking for the changes of the game; • ability to take a share from the industry by becoming an “intermediary”.  Finally, combined with a rapid expansion strategy and an active marketing campaign, the CRYSTALS project is anticipated to become a global service provider by the year 2020. It is expected to have more than 550 thousand users, 25 thousand active services performers, 825 thousand orders per year and 4 different platforms generating 26 million USD in revenue by the third year of operations.  In addition, CRYSTALS doesn’t have direct competitors while technically and legislatively ecosystem can operate worldwide.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: You are are absolutely right! Our global aim is to renovate and facilitate the interaction between both parties, customer and performer, within modeling industry. We want to eradicate such common problems in this field as territorial fragmentation, unhealthy competition, significant entry barriers, unjustified commissions, non-payment, and fraud risk.   The idea of CRYSTALS is to become an intermediary between service providers and their clients. This business model will not require high investments for investors to grow with minimal risk. This way, CRYSTALS will not provide any modeling services directly but will organize and support a secured, convenient, blockchain-based platform for this business.  To be concise,  our team wants to bring all the advantages of Blockchain technology into the modeling industry with the goal of creating a fundamentally new ecosystem that will drive further growth.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings!  CRYSTALS is a complete ecosystem that provides a full-service cycle for private modeling clients, models, and agencies. This platform is made to be the first ever software for the modeling industry with the use of blockchain and shared economy principles.  At CRYSTALS, we believe that in the 21st century, everyone should be able to be an entrepreneur on his own. As it can be seen, platforms such as Uber and Airbnb created a whole new concept of realizing unused individual assets in order to generate extra income. On the other hand, we have seen how online distribution channels such as Booking.com and Skyscanner changed the world of marketing for the tourism industry. Applying the same principles of shared economy and online distribution, CRYSTALS will become a tool for both.  The idea of CRYSTALS is to become an intermediary between service providers and their clients. This business model will not require high investments for investors to grow with minimal risk. This way, CRYSTALS will not provide any modeling services directly but will organize and support a secured, convenient, blockchain-based platform for this business.  Moreover, this will decrease the legal responsibility of the platform without decreasing the level of control of operations. Modeling industry is a very sensitive field and in CRYSTALS, we will dedicate a lot of attention to the legal procedures and honesty of the service provided through our platform.  The project ecosystem is based on our CRS Token, which is the only accepted payment method. Based on a blockchain technology, we have developed a decentralized and private double-authorization protocol that combines all the benefits of cash and online transactions while eliminating almost all risks for each party involved.  CRYSTALS Token (CRS) allows customers to pay securely, privately, and quickly for all services listed in the CRYSTALS ecosystem.  Quote from: Morros on June 12, 2018, 06:24:05 PM It is an attractive project. I really liked it. I think that in the nearest future it will have a success. Greetings!  Many thanks for such kind words!

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello there!  Models can buy them as investor, but to work on a platform they don't need to buy anything.  Quote from: Cezel619 on June 04, 2018, 07:54:22 PM How will you provide security?  We clearly understand that due to the nature of the services provided, both our partners and our clients are susceptible to all aspects of privacy. For this reason, our project is directly connected to our self-developed token, CRS. Based on the technology of cryptocurrencies double authorization powered by our smart contract, we can ensure an equal anonymity right for both the client and service provider.  In addition to payment, we are developing an intellectual rating system, which will allow everyone to be on an equal footing in the market. Also, to further protect both the client and the model, they will need to pass KYC.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Do you have KYC for ICO?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings!  In order to make sure that funds raised during our ICO campaign are coming from a legal source, we'll need to have KYC. However, only those who contribute 10k USD and more will have to go through the procedure. We should mention that our KYC will be rather simple and user-friendly. The only things you'll need to provide will be an Ethereum wallet, official ID, and a proof of residency (this can be done through official government letter, utility bill, bank letter or similar). But still you should note that only people who have been successfully verified will be able to withdraw their tokens.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Modeling industry is stagnating and in a big need of advanced solutions. CRYSTALS took this niche to aggregate as many modeling services as possible, proposing features to solve the present industry problems. Our project will give the whole modeling business a new lease of life!  As for CRS token, it is the base currency for CRYSTALS Ecosystem, so with every new user the demand for CRS grows. All services within ecosystem can be paid exclusively via CRS. Direct covering of new markets and platform development is the first reason for token’s growth. Userbase will grow respectively with each new market.  CRYSTALS also doesn’t have direct competitors while technically and legislatively ecosystem can operate worldwide. We are negotiating with major modeling agencies all over the world. Moreover, API will be made for integration with different payment systems. Every such integration will open access for hundreds and thousands points-of-sale over the world. As a result, CRS will be usable for other industries (different events, freelance etc.)
