Author: Morlurn46
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: how you will change modelling industry?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Modeling industry is stagnating and in a big need of advanced solutions. CRYSTALS took this niche to aggregate as many modeling services as possible, proposing features to solve the present industry problems.  At CRYSTALS, we believe that in the 21st century, everyone should be able to be an entrepreneur on his own. As it can be seen, platforms such as Uber and Airbnb created a whole new concept of realizing unused individual assets in order to generate extra income. On the other hand, we have seen how online distribution channels such as Booking.com and Skyscanner changed the world of marketing for the tourism industry. Applying the same principles of shared economy and online distribution, CRYSTALS will become a tool for both.  The idea of CRYSTALS is to become an intermediary between service providers and their clients. This business model will not require high investments for investors to grow with minimal risk. This way, CRYSTALS will not provide any modeling services directly but will organize and support a secured, convenient, blockchain-based platform for this business.  Moreover, this will decrease the legal responsibility of the platform without decreasing the level of control of operations. Modeling industry is a very sensitive field and in CRYSTALS, we will dedicate a lot of attention to the legal procedures and honesty of the service provided through our platform.

Author: Tygrabandis2
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Why did you choose exactly this industry?

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Greetings! We've chosen this industry because at CRYSTALS, we believe that in the 21st century, everyone should be able to be an entrepreneur on his own. As it can be seen, platforms such as Uber and Airbnb created a whole new concept of realizing unused individual assets in order to generate extra income. On the other hand, we have seen how online distribution channels such as Booking.com and Skyscanner changed the world of marketing for the tourism industry. Applying the same principles of shared economy and online distribution, CRYSTALS will become a tool for both.  The idea of CRYSTALS is to become an intermediary between service providers and their clients. This business model will not require high investments for investors to grow with minimal risk. This way, CRYSTALS will not provide any modeling services directly but will organize and support a secured, convenient, blockchain-based platform for this business.  Also there’s a number of advantages which we believe are making CRYSTALS the ultimate payment and distribution blockchain solution for the modelling industry:  Our strengths are: • matured $20 billion industry; • a lot of already operating agencies, meaning a lot of potential partners; • high demand for the services; • big amount of service performers. Our opportunities: • no competition for the CRYSTALS platform; • innovations that can generate profit; • industry is seeking for the changes of the game; • ability to take a share from the industry by becoming an “intermediary”.

You can try it on our website: http://crystals.zone/main_client.php Quote from: Cezel619 on June 01, 2018, 02:14:27 PM What goals will be possible to achieve with your softcap? A soft cap in the amount of $1 million is the minimum needed to ensure the entry of our product into the European Market.  Budget allocation in case of soft cap (numbers are given in USD): 100,000 (R&D) - Platform and smart contract creation. Audit and security check; 50,000 (R&D) - Wallet creation; 100,000 (R&D) - API development; 400,000 - Marketing activity, events, conferences, exhibitions, meeting with partner; 130,000 - Fixed costs: (office, support chain, salaries); 130,000 - Legal services for EU zone integration; 70,000 - User’s Incentives; 20,000 - Miscellaneous.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: The CRS is the base currency for CRYSTALS Ecosystem, so with every new user the demand for CRS grows. All services within ecosystem can be paid exclusively via CRS. Direct covering of new markets and platform development is the first reason for token’s growth. Userbase will grow respectively with each new market. CRYSTALS also doesn’t have direct competitors while technically and legislatively ecosystem can operate worldwide. We are negotiating with major modeling agencies all over the world. Moreover, API will be made for integration with different payment systems. Every such integration will open access for hundreds and thousands points-of-sale over the world. As a result, CRS will be usable for other industries (different events, freelance etc.)

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Hello there! The CRYSTALS ecosystem provides a full user-friendly service for customers and performers through two main products: CRYSTALS website and mobile app companion. It happened before when modeling-related applications were not accepted by the App Store and Google Play Market. We are already working on several solutions regarding that. One of which will include a self-signed certificate that any user can easily install on their mobile device. CRYSTALS will provide all new users with a prepaid encrypted cryptocurrency wallet. Similar to a prepaid card, customers will need to transfer the CRS token into ourplatform from his primary account to the prepaid account on our website. When client decided on his choice, he creates a pending order for the service provider. The order will have to include all necessary details, such as a type of a date, time, service needed etc. Immediately after booking is done, funds will be transferred from clients’ account into our CRS token smart contract. It is the 1st step of our double-authorization function. At this point, the customer knows that his money is in safe, blocked by smart-contract, and can be easily refunded. Since there is a commission on using Ethereum-based token transaction of 0.30-0.40 cents, the number of fake bookings or cancellations from the customer side will be limited. CRYSTALS platform is entirely free for all users. However, these transaction fees bring seriousness to all bookings. The booking then should be approved by the performer. The approval notification will reach both parties to the agreement. At this stage, money is held between both parties of the agreement. The decentralized blockchain system allows this be controlled neither by CRYSTALS team nor by any of the agreement party. This ensures the highest level of privacy for everyone because all transactions are done without human interaction. Upon the meeting, service performer has the right to a final decision. If everything is confirmed, a service provider will need to ask a client to confirm the transaction through his mobile app by simply pressing the button. CRS blockchain system will automatically recognize this confirmation as a 2nd authorization step immediately unblocks the money and transfer it to the associated account. Service performer will be able to see an instant credit on her or his account. This is the most crucial step of the platform. By eliminating usual cash transaction, CRYSTALS eliminates all related risks. In addition to all functions, CRYSTALS platform will operate an advanced rating system. This system will allow clients to search for the most relevant offers faster and easier. Apart from usual search parameters, all performers will be listed in accordance with various factors, such as level of verification, popularity, rating and relativity. On the other hand, the smart engine behind this rating and search platform will be able to analyze each service provider’s performance and suggest necessary step for increasing the number of orders. Therefore, everyone will have an equal competitive environment and will be motivated to work with the CRYSTALS platform.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Sure! Modeling service is a very sensitive due to the social poor understanding of the topic. This gives the top priority level of the privacy and security. In CRYSTALS, we found the best solution to provide both customers and service performers with privacy and security on one hand, and convenience on the other. Our CRYSTALS Token, CRS, with a unique double-authorization function will become an easy-to-use online payment method within the CRYSTALS ecosystem. CRYSTALS Token is the only possible online payment methods that devoid of all contemporary risks associated with online transactions. Thus, it combines all benefits from cash transactions, online payment methods and open smart contract technology, creating a special financial user friendly environment that is perfectly designed for modeling industry.

Combining CRYSTALS’ innovative technical solutions and my vision of the latter, I believe we will overcome them, fetching industry to the next level.”, – photographer Nikolas Verano said.  On the other hand, CRYSTALS Co-Founder and CEO Nikita Yakubovskyi heartily commented:  “We are happy to welcome Nikolas to our family. Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: In case of hardcap, we plan to enter Europe, CIS and America markets to the beginning of 2020. Thus, we can quickly achieve break-even and stable financial performance in 2021. In addition, if we fulfill this forecast, we can be sure that the CRYSTALS project will become the strongest brand in the modeling industry, without significant competitors in the market. Hardcap also allows us to release API and attract more partners. We will be able to launch the platform in several markets simultaneously.  As for the mentioned 500 000$, yes, those costs came from private sale contributors.  And, finally, why do we believe that our project will catch modeling agencies' attention? Well, CRYSTALS is a best-in-class distribution channel and data analysis facility that will act as an ideal partner for both modeling agencies and individuals, providing them with free-of-charge access to a global customer network and modern platform. A CRYSTALS commission will be charged once a transaction has been successfully executed, requiring confirmation from both parties. The project ecosystem is based on our CRS Token, which is the only accepted payment method. Based on a blockchain technology, we have developed a decentralized and private double-authorization protocol that combines all the benefits of cash and online transactions while eliminating almost all risks for each party involved. So, that's why we have faith in what we are doing and we believe that Crystals will renew the whole modeling industry!

Author: Crystals_official
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crystals - the first blockchain platform for modeling industry.
Body: Modeling service is a very sensitive due to the social poor understanding of the topic. This gives the top priority level of the privacy and security. In CRYSTALS, we found the best solution to provide both customers and service performers with privacy and security on one hand, and convenience on the other. Our CRYSTALS Token, CRS, with a unique double-authorization function will become an easy-to-use online payment method within the CRYSTALS ecosystem. CRYSTALS Token is the only possible online payment methods that devoid of all contemporary risks associated with online transactions. Thus, it combines all benefits from cash transactions, online payment methods and open smart contract technology, creating a special financial user friendly environment that is perfectly designed for modeling industry. The usage of a self-developed cryptocurrency CRS will make all transactions completely decentralized, providing the highest level of protection to both client and service performer.
